title: Orca Security Alerts
descriptionMarkdown: The Orca Security Alerts connector allows you to easily export Alerts logs to Azure Sentinel.

sampleQueries.description: Fetch all service vulnerabilities on running asset
sampleQueries.query: OrcaAlerts_CL | where alert_type_s == "service_vulnerability" | where asset_state_s == "running" | sort by TimeGenerated
OrcaAlerts_CL | where split(alert_labels_s, ",") contains("remote_code_execution") | sort by TimeGenerated

dataTypes.name: OrcaAlerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
OrcaAlerts_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
OrcaAlerts_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key)

instructionSteps.description: Follow [guidance](https://orcasecurity.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360043941992-Azure-Sentinel-configuration) for integrating Orca Security Alerts logs with Azure Sentinel.
